ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(ispickval(PRIORVALUE(X401k_S125_Account_Health__c),'Potential Risk') && ISPICKVAL(X401k_S125_Account_Health__c, 'At Risk')) ||
(ispickval(PRIORVALUE(HRO_Account_Health__c),'Potential Risk') && ISPICKVAL(HRO_Account_Health__c, 'At Risk')) ||
(ispickval(PRIORVALUE(TAA_Account_Health__c),'Potential Risk') && ISPICKVAL(TAA_Account_Health__c, 'At Risk')) && not(isnull(Client_Health_Date_TAA__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please change the account health to 'stable' before changing it to 'At Risk'.
